title: STEAM-Based Problem-Solving Digital Making Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Digital Making Activities for Creative Problem-Solving in Resource-Limited Mobile Environments. Students Assume Professional Roles and Complete Case-Based Tasks

learning_goals: Students will be able to create innovative digital artifacts that solve real-world problems by integrating STEAM education elements.
Learners will be able to design prototypes applying mathematical concepts using block-based programming in mobile environments.
Participants will be able to develop solutions with originality, utility, and aesthetic elements through the Problem-Based Learning (PBL) process.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
